premium:
You can purchase premium features by visiting <https://arcanebot.xyz/premium>

**__Some of Premium's Features:**
✨Premium lets you rename Arcane and choose a custom avatar
📈 Custom XP rates
🆙 **Guarenteed uptime**
🚨 Enhanced logging features
🏋️‍♂️ Raised limits
